verses.verse: Then <S%H1085>Bildad<s%> the <S%H7747>Shuhite<s%> <S%H6030>answered,<s%>
"How <S%H5704>long<s%> will you <S%H7760>hunt<s%> <S%H7078>for<s%> <S%H4405>words?<s%> <S%H995>Consider,<s%> and <S%H310>afterwards<s%> we will <S%H1696>speak.<s%>
Why are we <S%H2803>counted<s%> as <S%H929>animals,<s%> which have become <S%H2933>unclean<s%> in your <S%H5869>sight?<s%>

You who <S%H2963>tear<s%> <S%H5315>yourself<s%> in your <S%H639>anger,<s%> shall the <S%H776>earth<s%> be <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> for <S%H6697>you?<s%> Or shall the rock be <S%H6275>removed<s%> out of its <S%H4725>place?<s%>
<S%H216>"Yes,<s%> the light of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall be put <S%H1846>out,<s%> The <S%H7632>spark<s%> of his <S%H784>fire<s%> shall not <S%H5050>shine.<s%>
The <S%H216>light<s%> shall be <S%H2821>dark<s%> in his <S%H168>tent.<s%> His <S%H5216>lamp<s%> above him shall be put <S%H1846>out.<s%>
The <S%H6806>steps<s%> of his <S%H202>strength<s%> shall be <S%H3334>shortened.<s%> His own <S%H6098>counsel<s%> shall cast him <S%H7993>down.<s%>
For he is <S%H7971>cast<s%> into a <S%H7568>net<s%> by his own <S%H7272>feet,<s%> and he wanders into its <S%H7639>mesh.<s%>
A <S%H6341>snare<s%> will <S%H270>take<s%> him by the <S%H6119>heel.<s%> A <S%H6782>trap<s%> will catch <S%H2388>him.<s%>
A <S%H2256>noose<s%> is <S%H2934>hidden<s%> for him in the <S%H776>ground,<s%> a <S%H4434>trap<s%> for him in the <S%H5410>way.<s%>
<S%H1091>Terrors<s%> shall make him <S%H1204>afraid<s%> on every <S%H5439>side,<s%> and shall <S%H6327>chase<s%> him at his <S%H7272>heels.<s%>
His <S%H202>strength<s%> shall be <S%H7457>famished.<s%> <S%H343>Calamity<s%> shall be <S%H3559>ready<s%> at his <S%H6763>side.<s%>
The <S%H905>members<s%> of his <S%H5785>body<s%> shall be <S%H398>devoured.<s%> The <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of <S%H4194>death<s%> shall <S%H398>devour<s%> his <S%H905>members.<s%>
He shall be rooted <S%H5423>out<s%> of his <S%H168>tent<s%> where he <S%H4009>trusts.<s%> He shall be <S%H6805>brought<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1091>terrors.<s%>
There shall <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in his <S%H168>tent<s%> that which is <S%H1097>none<s%> of <S%H1614>his.<s%> Sulfur shall be <S%H2219>scattered<s%> on his <S%H5116>habitation.<s%>
His <S%H8328>roots<s%> shall be dried <S%H3001>up<s%> <S%H4605>beneath.<s%> Above shall his <S%H7105>branch<s%> be cut <S%H5243>off.<s%>
His <S%H2143>memory<s%> shall <S%H6>perish<s%> from the <S%H776>earth.<s%> He shall have no <S%H8034>name<s%> in the <S%H6440>street.<s%>
He shall be <S%H1920>driven<s%> from <S%H216>light<s%> into <S%H2822>darkness,<s%> and <S%H5074>chased<s%> out of the <S%H8398>world.<s%>
He shall have neither <S%H5209>son<s%> nor <S%H5220>grandson<s%> among his <S%H5971>people,<s%> nor any <S%H8300>remaining<s%> where he <S%H4033>lived.<s%>
Those who come <S%H314>after<s%> shall be <S%H8074>astonished<s%> at his <S%H3117>day,<s%> as those who went <S%H6931>before<s%> were <S%H270>frightened.<s%>
Surely such are the <S%H4908>dwellings<s%> of the <S%H5767>unrighteous.<s%> This is the <S%H4725>place<s%> of him who <S%H3045>doesn't<s%> know <S%H410>God.<s%>"
